# Exploratory Data Analysis
## Summary of Listings Data
```{python summary, eval=T, echo=F, code=readLines('../notebooks/1.0_data_summary.py')}
```

`r kfigr::figr(label = "eda_summary", prefix = TRUE, link = TRUE, type="Table")`: San Francisco Listings Summary
```{r eda_summary, eval=T, echo=F, results='asis'}
kable(py$summary) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options=c("striped", "hover", "condensed"), full_width=T)
```
## Columns by Dataset
`r kfigr::figr(label = "eda_columns", prefix = TRUE, link = TRUE, type="Table")`: Columns by Dataset
```{r eda_columns, eval=T, echo=F, results='asis'}
kable(py$columns) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options=c("striped", "hover", "condensed"), full_width=T)
```
